title: Recommender System for Travel
description: A personalized travel recommender system that provides destination suggestions based on user preferences and a knowledge base.

title: Spotify Replica
description: A Spotify-like music application featuring user authentication, song uploads, and playlist management with a Java Swing interface.

title: Book Discussion Web Application
description: A web platform for book enthusiasts with user authentication, book search, and discussion forums, powered by a custom REST API.

title: HAL 9000 (Client-Server Music Streaming System)
description: A client-server system simulating a distributed music streaming service using IPC techniques like sockets, threads, and semaphores.

title: Limited-Slip Differential Controller for STM32F429I
description: A system that measures wheel speeds and adjusts torque distribution in real-time using accelerometer data, with a graphical interface for visualization.

title: Typing Test Web App (Code Snippets)
description: A web application that evaluates typing speed and accuracy for code snippets, providing insights on error patterns and programming language performance.

title: Web Portfolio
description: A personal web portfolio built with React to showcase projects, skills, and career experience in an interactive and modern design.

title: ATM Monitoring & Management System (Fujitsu)
description: A web platform for managing and monitoring ATM machines at Banco Sabadell, featuring real-time tracking, maintenance tools, and command execution services.
